statements: SELECT * FROM transportation_data;
SELECT id, incident_type FROM transportation_data WHERE delay_duration > '1 hour';
SELECT id, disruption_reason FROM transportation_data WHERE incident_type = 'Accident' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, delay_duration FROM transportation_data WHERE incident_type = 'Mechanical Failure' LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, disruption_reason FROM transportation_data WHERE incident_type = 'Weather Condition' AND disruption_reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, delay_duration, incident_type, disruption_reason FROM transportation_data WHERE incident_type = 'Accident';
SELECT * FROM transportation_data WHERE delay_duration > INTERVAL '5 minutes';
SELECT * FROM transportation_data ORDER BY incident_type DESC, delay_duration ASC;
SELECT id, incident_type FROM transportation_data WHERE disruption_reason LIKE '%weather%';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM transportation_data WHERE delay_duration < INTERVAL '1 hour';
SELECT * FROM delays WHERE vehicle_id = 123;
SELECT delay_reason, delay_time FROM delays WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE incident_type = 'incident' ORDER BY incident_time DESC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, description FROM incidents WHERE incident_type = 'accident' AND incident_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(delay_time) AS latest_delay FROM delays;
SELECT * FROM delays WHERE vehicle_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY delay_time DESC;
SELECT id, delay_reason FROM delays WHERE delay_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND delay_reason LIKE 'Traffic%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, incident_time FROM incidents WHERE incident_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY incident_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM delays WHERE delay_reason = 'Maintenance' AND delay_time >= '2023-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT incident_id, description FROM incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Accident' AND description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY incident_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM delays WHERE id = 1;
SELECT delay_time, reason FROM delays WHERE delay_time > 10 ORDER BY delay_time ASC;
SELECT incident_type, description FROM incidents WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT disruption_type, affected_route, start_timestamp FROM disruptions WHERE disruption_type = 'Major';
SELECT * FROM delays JOIN disruptions ON delays.route_id = disruptions.affected_route WHERE disruptions.start_timestamp > '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM delays WHERE reason = 'weather' ORDER BY delay_time DESC, id
SELECT delay_time, reason FROM delays WHERE delay_time > 10 AND route_id = 5 ORDER BY delay_time
SELECT id, description, timestamp FROM incidents WHERE incident_type = 'accident' AND TIMESTAMP > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT disruption_type, affected_route, start_timestamp, end_timestamp FROM disruptions WHERE end_timestamp >= '2022-08-01' AND disruption_type = 'maintenance' ORDER BY start_timestamp
SELECT reason, delay_time FROM delays LEFT JOIN disruptions ON delays.route_id = disruptions.affected_route WHERE disruptions.disruption_type = 'maintenance' ORDER BY delay_time DESC
SELECT * FROM delays;
SELECT id, delay_reason FROM delays WHERE delay_minutes > 10;
SELECT incident_description, incident_date FROM incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT disruption_cause, disruption_start FROM disruptions WHERE disruption_end > '2023-01-01' AND disruption_start < '2023-06-01';
SELECT * FROM improvements ORDER BY improvement_date;
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Accident' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT disruption_cause, disruption_start, disruption_end FROM disruptions WHERE disruption_cause = 'Weather' ORDER BY disruption_end ASC;
SELECT id, delay_reason, delay_minutes FROM delays WHERE delay_minutes > 30 ORDER BY delay_minutes DESC;
SELECT * FROM improvements WHERE improvement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY improvement_date DESC;
SELECT incident_type, incident_description FROM incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Fire' ORDER BY incident_description ASC;
SELECT * FROM delays ORDER BY delay_minutes DESC;
SELECT id, delay_reason FROM delays WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT disruption_id, disruption_reason FROM disruptions WHERE disruption_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE incident_description LIKE '%accident%';
SELECT vehicle_type, vehicle_capacity FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_capacity >= 50;
SELECT * FROM delays WHERE id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_id, delay_minutes FROM delays WHERE delay_minutes > 10 ORDER BY delay_minutes DESC;
SELECT disruption_reason, COUNT(disruption_id) AS total_disruptions FROM disruptions GROUP BY disruption_reason HAVING total_disruptions > 1;
SELECT vehicles.vehicle_id, vehicles.vehicle_capacity, routes.route_name FROM vehicles INNER JOIN routes ON vehicles.vehicle_id = routes.route_id;
SELECT incidents.incident_date, incidents.incident_description, vehicles.vehicle_type FROM incidents LEFT JOIN vehicles ON incidents.incident_id = vehicles.vehicle_id;
